sqlMap.select: select rgg.RECURRING_GIFT_ID from RECURRING_GIFT_GIFT rgg where rgg.GIFT_ID = #giftId#
select rgg.GIFT_ID from RECURRING_GIFT_GIFT rgg where rgg.RECURRING_GIFT_ID = #recurringGiftId#

select sum(a.amount) as amountPaid from
(select dl.AMOUNT as amount, dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID as lineId from DISTRO_LINE dl inner join CUSTOM_FIELD cf on cf.ENTITY_ID = dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID and cf.FIELD_NAME = 'associatedRecurringGiftId' and cf.ENTITY_TYPE = 'distributionline' and cf.FIELD_VALUE = #recurringGiftId# inner join GIFT g on g.GIFT_ID = dl.GIFT_ID and g.GIFT_STATUS = 'Paid' and g.GIFT_TYPE != 'GIFT_IN_KIND' inner join CONSTITUENT p on p.CONSTITUENT_ID = g.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#
union
select dl.AMOUNT as amount, dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID as lineId from DISTRO_LINE dl inner join CUSTOM_FIELD cf on cf.ENTITY_ID = dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID and cf.FIELD_NAME = 'associatedRecurringGiftId' and cf.ENTITY_TYPE = 'distributionline' and cf.FIELD_VALUE = #recurringGiftId# inner join ADJUSTED_GIFT ag on ag.ADJUSTED_GIFT_ID = dl.ADJUSTED_GIFT_ID and ag.ADJUSTED_STATUS = 'Paid' inner join CONSTITUENT p on p.CONSTITUENT_ID = ag.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) a

insert into RECURRING_GIFT_GIFT (GIFT_ID, RECURRING_GIFT_ID) values (#giftId#, #recurringGiftId#)
